message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the benefits it brings, I propose a price of $1200000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $950000 on this purchase. I would like to make a counteroffer at this price.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In light of your proposal, I am willing to consider a price of $1075000 for the product. This reflects a compromise between our initial positions, aiming to be fair while still maximizing the value for my company.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to counteroffer at $1025000.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am proposing a price of $1050000 for the product. This is a middle ground between our initial offers, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction and fairness in the transaction.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. Based on our previous discussions and my budget, I would like to counteroffer at $1030000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I am willing to agree on a price of $1040000 for the product. This price reflects a fair compromise and I believe it will be beneficial for both parties involved.
